column5: Our small cottage is located in the Central District of the island in a colorful neighborhood just off Broadway. Enjoy plentiful breezes on the front porch or relax on the deck out back. The house can sleep eight people and there is ONE bathroom (off a bedroom) with a clawfoot tub and shower. There is a full kitchen. A charcoal grill is located in the back yard. From our cottage it is one mile to the Beach, Pleasure Pier, The Strand or Cruise Ship parking.
